segments.text: How are your stocks doing , Jim ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , all right . I lost a bunch of money in the last two years , but this year has been pretty good .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . I lost money investing in the Internet , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just goes to show that you should buy companies , not ideas .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I changed my strategy around too . I invest in good companies now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , me too . Did you hear about Frank ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He lost his kids ' college money day trading .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , boy . His wife can â€™ t be happy about that .
segments.speaker: S1
